post.body: I am allergic to rats (which I work with). Luckily seems to not cross over to rabbits (yet)
Yes, they are both gorgeous. We are happy that some other family decided not to keep them so the we could adopt them. Maybe.
"I never win these things" But you have a better chance than some - how many categories are you nominated in?
My neighbours who accept my rubbish are a sweet old greek couple. Suspect they eat from garden, buy nothing. They have 1 bag/wk
I haven't noticed slow writing. I am not limited for rapid fire candids. (I don't do sport, though)
I've got a Canon EOS20D and it is the coolest camera I have ever had. Bit loud on shutter so you can't take photos of kids sleeping.
http://twitpic.com/zzvw - Tehe.
Thanks. I am stoked.
I am in a similar position - cool to be a finalist, but I am up against @allergynotes as well!
Yep, tweetie rocks.
Cool thing to do with primary aged kids: Blind contour drawing http://bit.ly/13rwv
This is why we adopted our rabbits. Remember you can get all sorts of animals at RSPCA, desexed and vaccinated. http://bit.ly/dhjW
RT @sentience: Via @sealfur: Apple Introduces Revolutionary New Laptop With No Keyboard http://www.theonion.com/content/node/92328
http://twitpic.com/10166 - This is Lulu. She has had her operation and is waiting to come home at the end of the week.
http://twitpic.com/1015w - A pre-adoption photo of Nemo. He looks even healthier now.

Nope. The Jackson 5 just aint doin it for me
